Package mloss.roc.util

Provides utility classes for using (and testing) Roc.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayIterator<E>
    An iterator for arrays so that arrays can be used as iterables alongside collections and the like.
    Arrays
    All the array utilities we wished Java included.
    IterableArray<E>
    Makes object arrays into iterables so as to work alongside collections and the like.

Package mloss.roc.util Description

Provides utility classes for using (and testing) Roc. In particular, provides utilities for upgrading arrays of primitives all the way to iterables of objects.

  • Arrays provides conversions from arrays of primitives to arrays of objects.
  • IterableArray and ArrayIterator work together to provide iteration over arrays just as in the standard collections.
